idiotproof67
this isnt the hollywood version!
this is how they did it! how they survived ect!!

I hope this is the old black-and-white documentary about one of the most exciting stories of WW2. For us Norwegians who know what really happened, the Kirk Douglas version only sucks. The real guys certainly did not have a luxury cottage where they could live out their romances.

Kuthumi
no it is not the black and white documantairy

Thanks, this is a new BBC documentary where modern guys try to repeat the deeds. Also interviews with the real, old boys. This documentary is briefly described at http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0499247/
The old black-and-white film from 1942 was called "Kampen om tungtvannet" (Battle of the Heavy Water) http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0040504/ and clips from it are used in the documentary. By the way, "Gutta på tur" made a similar documentary called "Gutta på Vemork". Olympic skiing masters Bjørn Dæhlie and Vegard Ulvang really had to struggle!
